ProjectTitle: Precarious critique: demarcating a socially engaged critical theory
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/02/2023
Data: please also include the articles/books that you study as reused data and explain the source, you don't have to mention your own publication and thesis in a DMP, this is not considered data 
Documentation: will you use a reference manager e.g. Zotero, or tools such as Nvivo? For more information see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/tools
Storage and preservation: It is more secure to use one KU Leuven storage solution with automatic backup, please have a look at the storage guide to help you choose the most suitable storage solution: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: Please note that Lirias is a publication repository, for data sharing KU Leuven has a data repository RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
